posts.post_content:
** SOLD **only - need to fund a HS grad gift for my son, letting this go for less than I got it here on net54. Card presents better than the grade imo, has some writing on the back likely accounting for the "1" grade.

**SOLD** $%%% net to me (paypal or venmo), shipped usps priority conus

**I have this crossposted for sale on ebay at a much higher price, so this offer is good as long as it hasn't sold on there - I will update this post accordingly if it does happen to sell.
